code: export const getSavedBookIds=()=>{const savedBookIds=localStorage.getItem('saved_books')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('saved_books')):[];return savedBookIds;};export const saveBookIds=bookIdArr=>{if(bookIdArr.length){localStorage.setItem('saved_books',JSON.stringify(bookIdArr));}else{localStorage.removeItem('saved_books');}};export const removeBookId=bookId=>{const savedBookIds=localStorage.getItem('saved_books')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('saved_books')):null;if(!savedBookIds){return false;}const updatedSavedBookIds=savedBookIds===null||savedBookIds===void 0?void 0:savedBookIds.filter(savedBookId=>savedBookId!==bookId);localStorage.setItem('saved_books',JSON.stringify(updatedSavedBookIds));return true;};
